about_the_game:
This is a demo version of Yuri Sword Saga. Player can challenge the tutorial and a high difficulty boss.

Game Features

The game features action with the sword, by wielding the sword,
Attack the enemy
Eliminate some bullets
Parry and nullify enemy melee attacks
and other actions are possible.

With the sword, power is accumulated and special techniques such as "Iai" and "Ougi" can be unleashed.
There are also challenging elements, such as reinforcement only during the stage with spiritual power obtained by defeating enemies, or permanent reinforcement with coins obtained by defeating bosses.

Story

The time is turbulent.
Two divine swords, Kuroyuri and Shiroyuri, were dedicated deep in the mountains of Kyoto.
Their powerful power was only there to keep the demons and evil spirits from doing evil.

One day, a large thunderbolt destroyed the shrine and the sheath where the sword was located.
When left unarmed, the sword's power waned and it could not glare at the enemy.
They took the form of a person on one side and a sword on the other, and when fighting the enemy, they kept the sword inside their bodies.
Their journey to defeat the monsters and demons that abound in the world and to obtain a new sheath begins.

content_descriptors.notes: This work has some exposed characters.

name: Yuri Sword Saga Demo
short_description: This is a side-scrolling shoot 'em up game set in a beautifully drawn Japanese world where you can slay enemies and bullets with simple controls. Parry enemy attacks and use a variety of special moves to defeat powerful demons and evil monsters.
